title: Nautilus mastery blocked
body: I play a lot of nautilus, or used too, and with mastery 6 (Could be 5 and 7 but i have 6) whenever i flash it after a good engage or just cause i can my healthbar is in the middle of it. rito please fix    {{item:3070}} {{champion:111}}

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This occurs with several champions and skins. We're working to make it so everyone can see your mastery, regardless of who you're playing. :)
I too am mastery 6 with him and his mastery is blocked by his health bar. It looks pretty bad to flash. I think it may have to do with Nautilus's massive size. Have you seen Lux's shield on him haha?
